thread.title: TBZ Ties Up With Snapdeal To Showcase Jewellery
thread.title_full: TBZ Ties Up With Snapdeal To Showcase Jewellery

title: TBZ Ties Up With Snapdeal To Showcase Jewellery
text:
Published: Friday, October 9, 2015, 11:29 [IST] Facebook Twitter Google+ Comments Mail 
The jewellery company Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri on Friday said that it has tied up with e-commerce company Snapdeal to showcase their jewellery and gold coins. 
The Company presents an exquisite range of diamond jewellery and gold coins on Snapdeal, the company said in the BSE press release. Tribhovandas Bhimji Zaveri: Quotes , News BSE 130.50 NSE 130.25 4.5 (-3.34%) 
TBZ - The Original's diamond jewellery range of rings, earrings, pendants, bracelets and gold coins will be available and accessible to discerning buyers on Snapdeal at affordable prices, further added. 
The tie up with Snapdeal will help TBZ to showcase their high-quality diamond jewellery and gold coins anytime, anywhere on online marketplace. 
Shares of the company was seen trading at Rs 131.60, lower by 2.37 per cent on BSE at 11.22 am IST. The stock touched an intra-day high of Rs 138.70 during the trade. 
GoodReturns.in
